lead_paragraph: Another summer recess on the horizon, another Supreme Court nominee to confirm.
snippet: A vote is expected this week on Elena Kagan's nomination to the Supreme Court, perhaps the only order of business Democrats can expect to accomplish before the summer recess.

headline.main: Kagan Vote Is Expected This Week

abstract: A vote is expected this week on Elena Kagan's nomination to the Supreme Court, perhaps the only order of business Democrats can expect to accomplish before the summer recess.
